FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: “The cathars have their swords, the inquisitors their axes. I prefer the ‘diplomatic’ approach.” —Terhold, archmage of Drunau

SPELL_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Return up to two target creatures to their owners’ hands.
Return up to two target creatures to their owners’ hands.
Return up to two target creatures to their owners’ hands.
Return up to two target creatures to their owners’ hands.
Return up to two target creatures to their owners’ hands.
Return up to two target creatures to their owners’ hands.
Return up to two target creatures to their owners’ hands.
Return up to two target creatures to their owners’ hands.
Return up to two target creatures to their owners’ hands.
SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.PLAY_TIME_ACTION: local player = EffectController() player:SetTargetCount( 2 ) player:SetTargetPrompt( 0, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CREATURE_TO_PUT_INTO_HAND" ) player:SetTargetPrompt( 1, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CREATURE_TO_PUT_INTO_HAND" ) EffectController():ChooseTargetsWithFlags( 0, EffectDC():Make_Targets(0), QUERY_FLAG_CAN_BE_FINISHED_EARLY + QUERY_FLAG_CAN_BE_FINISHED_EARLY_FOR_AI_AS_WELL)
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: for i = 0,1 do local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_NthCardPtr(i) if (target ~= nil ) then target:PutInHand() end end
